name: Planetary Guides Enterprise, At Your Service
name_original: Planetary Guides Enterprise, At Your Service
description:
Planetary Guides Enterprise, At Your Service is a sci-fi/thriller and adventure game. You, the player, are thrown into the beginning of a tour by Planetary Guides Enterprise, a galactic tour company that offers planetary exploration. The tour guides, Tougie and TG1, give you three options for tour packages: Light, Dark, or Void. Each takes you on a different adventure as your guide shows you wonderful planets - well, until things start going downhill. 

Every choice you make has an impact on the ending you achieve, so choose wisely.

Enjoy your tour. :)
